properties.name: azure.client-id
properties.description: The application (client) ID of your app registration

properties.name: azure.client-secret
properties.description: The client secret of your app registration

properties.name: azure.subscription-id
properties.description: The ID of your Azure subscription

properties.name: azure.resource-group
properties.description: The Azure resource group where the partner topic should be created

properties.name: azure.event-grid-topic
properties.description: The name of the partner topic that should be created

properties.name: azure.location
properties.description: The location where the Azure resource group is located (for example: eastus)
